Articles.Content: Hello, I am new to the forums and I have only just started played KSP but I have been watching gameplay videos on the game for years and I have owned the game since it's release on steam but just recently got a new gaming computer powerful enough to run the game smoothly. I am enjoying the game well and I hope I get to know you all well.
Welcome aboard! Yeah, running KSP on a weaker machine is excruciating. I keep trying to play on my laptop but give up each time.
Welcome! Enjoy exploring the sites and (presumably loud) sounds of the Kerbin solar system.
